column4: Hi all, I have two OS on my computer, Window 7 and Ubuntu 12.04, the computer get stuck when booting the Ubuntu, how can repair ??? Thanks !
Hi all, I have two OS on my computer, Window 7 and Ubuntu 12.04, the computer get stuck when booting the Ubuntu, how can repair ??? Thanks !
You don't have to repeat yourself. Someone will reply with an answer once somebody's available :P
What other info can you provide, by the way? What exactly is happening when you try to start Ubuntu.
